definitions: in a decisive way that has the effect of proving a case

examples.text: the story had been conclusively debunked
I have shown conclusively that there was no such epidemic

shortDefinitions: in decisive way that is likely to have effect of proving case

definitions: in a way that is achieved easily or by a large margin

examples.text: wars are difficult to win conclusively

shortDefinitions: in way that is achieved easily or by large margin
